titleStmt.title: SII 7.1004: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1004. (A.R. No. 374 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE, LEFT OF ENTRANCE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmevi vaḷar tiruppoṉ mārvu puṇara nāmevu kalaimakaḷ nalamperitu ciṟappa vicaiyamāmakaḷ velpuyat tiruppa Icaiyuñ celviyum Eṇṭicai viḷaṅka nirupar vantiṟaiñca
niṇilamaṭantaiyait tirumaṇam puṇarntu cirvaḷar tarumamaṇimuṭi kavitteṉa Aṇimuṭi cūṭi mallaiñālattup palluyiṟ kellām Ellaiyi liṉpam Iyalviṉu ḷeyta veṇkuṭai
niḻaṟṟac ceṅko locci Ūḻi pallūḻi Āḻi naṭappac cempoṉ vīrasiṅṅāsaṉattup puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya korājakecaripanmarāna tribhuvaṉaccak
karavarttikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu Eḻāvatu Irājarājavaḷanāṭṭu tirumuṉaippāṭi melūrnāṭṭut tirunāvalūrāṉa Irācātittapurattu Uṭaiyār tiruttoṇṭīśvaramuṭaiyāṟku peṟukanūrṉāṭṭu
kūṭalūr paḷḷi Āḷappiṟantāṉ mokanāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻakacciyarāyaṉ Iṭṭa makaratoraṇam Onṟināl Oṉpatemukkāl māṟi poṉ nūṟṟukkaḻañcum piṟai Onṟiṉāl Eṭṭemukkāl māṟi
pon mukkaḻañcum kūttāṭundevaṟku cātti Aruḷa Iṭṭa Abhiṣekam Onṟiṉāl Onpatarai māṟi poṉ Irupatiṉ kaḻañcum Amutuceytaruḷa Iṭṭa veḷḷittaḷikai Oṉṟiṉāl Iṭai
Āyirattu Aiññūṟṟu nāṟkaḻañ caraiye yiraṇṭu mañcāṭiyum nālumāvum Aracanārāyaṇan veḷḷik kaccukkoram Oṉṟiṉāl Iṭai Irunūṟṟu Irupattunā
ṟ kaḻañcum veṇkalam Āḷappiṟantāṉtaḷikai Oṉṟināl Iṭai Irunūṟṟup palamum tiruaṭṭaṇaikkāl tarā Onṟiṉāl Iṭai nūṟṟu Eṇpattu Aimpalamum
kompu Orāṇaiyāl tarā Iṭai muppattaṟu palamum tirunāvalūrāṉa Irācātittapuramum Ittoṭum kūṭina kārāṇaiyāṉa viracoḻanallūrum Ivviraṇṭuril pāṭikāvaluṭai
yār tiruttoṇṭiśvaramuṭaiyāṟku veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku viṭṭen Āḷappiṟantāṉ mokanāṉa kulottuṅkacoḻa kacciyarāyaneṉ villiṭai piṭittāṉ Itu Aḻivāṉ keṅkaiiṭai kumariI
A few letters are lost at the end.
Digital edition of SII 7.1004 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
